import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import UserAPI from "../API/UserAPI"; import ProductAPI from "../API/ProductAPI"; import HistoryAPI from "../API/HistoryAPI"; function Home(props) { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); const [order, setOrder] = useState([]); const date = new Date(); const formatCurrency = (value) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat("vi-VN", { style: "currency", currency: "VND", }).format(value); }; useEffect(async () => { const response = await UserAPI.getAllData(); setUsers(response.data); }, []); useEffect(async () => { const products = await ProductAPI.getAPI(); setProduct(products.data.products); }, []); useEffect(async () => { const response = await HistoryAPI.getAll(); setOrder(response.data); }, []); const total = () => { let avg = 0; order.map((item) => { avg += item.total; }); return avg; }; const avg = total(); return (
